item.title: Help me with spawning please
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

Maybe, you have two commands with the same name, one being that one with 0 playerRights, and the other being with 2 + playerRights. delete the one with 2 + playerRights, it might be reading that, instead of yours.

item.title: Help me with spawning please
item.dc:creator: @kyled123 kyled123
item.description:
@kyled123 wrote:

hello, i downloaded the server there by palidino76 and…well heres a few of my commands…

		}
		else if (command.startsWith("torag") && playerRights >= 0)
		{
			addItem(4745,1);
			addItem(4747,1);
			addItem(4749,1);
			addItem(4751,1);
		}
		else if (command.startsWith("verac") && playerRights >= 0)
		{
			addItem(4753,1);
			addItem(4755,1);
			addItem(4757,1);
			addItem(4759,1);

yeah…notice the " && playerRights >= 0)"

but for some reason you cant do them codes unless ur an admin… how do i make it so everyone can spawn?
[br][size=1]Posted on: October 07, 2007, 09:50:00 PM[/size][hr]?

Read full topic
